2010-02-10

Songs with SFX # 4: Kate Bush

Time to kick some life into Everything's Swirling. My intention is for more shorter posts so here's one.

Kate Bush will probably make many appearances in this series but as I was listening to Ariel this morning and as I'm a sucker for bird noises - here are the pigeons (and other tweets) that open the second disc of her last album...

Ariel should have been in many more end of decade lists - including mine. Not sure where (or if) Hazel published her list but I'm certain it was in there.
